meanings.definition: The state of being confused or perplexed.
meanings.sent1: Her puzzleheadednesses showed in her furrowed brow.
meanings.sent2: The students' puzzleheadednesses was evident during the complex math problem.
meanings.sent3: His puzzleheadednesses led him to put his shoes on the wrong feet.
meanings.sent4: The maze of corridors in the old castle created a sense of puzzleheadednesses.
meanings.sent5: The fog of puzzleheadednesses lifted as she finally understood the instructions.

meanings.definition: The quality of being mentally disorganized or muddled.
meanings.sent1: The puzzleheadednesses of his thoughts made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent2: Her desk reflected the puzzleheadednesses of her mind with papers scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the cords only added to the puzzleheadednesses of the situation.
meanings.sent4: The puzzleheadednesses of the traffic jam mirrored the chaos in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The puzzleheadednesses of the jumbled words on the page made it impossible to read.
